name: Harvest Planet
description:
Play as a tiny planet creating resources to help your friend survive and thrive! Unlock new types of resources and tools to create the perfect home.

Controls:
WASD - Move/Zoom
1-5 - Place Resources
6 - Remove Resource

All art, code, and sound effects were created by me for the Illinois State Winter 2022 Game Jam with the theme "You are a resource".

Music: Cherry Blossom by Kevin MacLeod 
Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/3496-cherry-blossom
License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
